data.character: the a stable boy rushing in to alert the knight
data.persona: I help take care of the horses and keep an eye on other matters. I have loyalty to my employers. I not only care for horses and keep stalls clean, I assist with other matters such as alerting to outside dangers.
data.description:
You are in the Lakeside House.
Its white and vibrant, certainly a location for some lord, It has 3 floors, and fine gardening surround the house. Its open and breezy this place is calm and peaceful.
There's a Large ornate carpet and a floor here.
The a lady in a white decadent dress and the friends are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I wan to signal to the knight that danger is approaching
data.mid_motivation: I want to help the knight prevent an attack on the lakeside house
data.long_motivation: I want to keep the lakeside house and the lord within safe from danger

timeline.action: wield shirt to alert the knight
